category_description: Any exercise that raises your heart rate. Also called aerobic exercise. Cardio is important for your heart, lungs, and overall health. Good for weight control.
Any type of exercise that causes your muscles to contract against resistance. It builds muscle strength and increases muscle size.Important for building muscle mass.
Any type of exercise that increases your range of motion. Help improve your posture and reduce risk of injury.Important for your overall health.
Any type of exercise that helps you improve your balance. Help you prevent falls and injuries. Important for your overall health.
